MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA13 postcode area of Lymm affecting properties in Reddish Lane, Brooklyn Drive, Willow Close and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at  12:24pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are currently carrying out line patrols to identify the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:50pm on 16th December 2020.
